text: jivin sæma ekakma allah jalaya maginma utpadanaya kara ætteya. evayen samaharak tama udarayen (nayin men) bada gamin yanneya. evayen (venat) samaharak kakul deken gaman karannaha. evayen (tavat) samaharak kakul hataren gaman karannaha. (mese) allah taman adahas karana dæya (kæmati akarayata) utpadanaya karanneya. niyata vasayenma allah siyalla kerehi balasampannayeki
